              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/BrineMinister" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Steve Brine MP</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/BrineMinister">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">BrineMinister</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Parliamentary under Secretary of State for Primary Care and Public Health at U.K. Dept of Health. MP for Winchester.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              England, United Kingdom

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">  <a class="u-textUserColor" target="_blank" rel="me nofollow noopener" href="https://t.co/7WJPbrn2jf" title="http://www.stevebrine.com/">
    stevebrine.com
  </a>

</span>
      </div>



      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate">
        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText js-tooltip u-dir" dir="ltr" title="3:32 am - 2 Jul 2017">Joined July 2017</span>

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So impressed to see how Amsterdam has embraced whole community approach to tackling <a href="/hashtag/childobesity?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>childobesity</b></a> -  schools, health staff, business &amp; parents all on board. Thanks to <a href="/albertheijn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="279015870"><s>@</s><b>albertheijn</b></a> supermarket for showing me and <a href="/Baronessjenkin" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="334551644"><s>@</s><b>Baronessjenkin</b></a> their in-store work.<a href="https://t.co/4IDRI0NvjB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/4IDRI0NvjB</a></p>
</div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="972154852653617152" id="stream-item-tweet-972154852653617152" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;972154852653617152&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="972154852653617152" data-item-id="972154852653617152" data-permalink-path="/Symonds_College/status/972154852653617152" data-conversation-id="972154852653617152" data-tweet-nonce="972154852653617152-3e568f3b-e8b7-4e98-a03a-7b01406a8ab7" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="972437485157601280" data-retweeter="BrineMinister" data-screen-name="Symonds_College" data-name="Peter Symonds" data-user-id="964014026" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="DamianHinds BrineMinister" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;964014026&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Symonds_College&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Peter Symonds&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Peter Symonds&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Peter Symonds&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;881460664270761984&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;BrineMinister&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14561015&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;DamianHinds&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Damian Hinds&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Damian Hinds&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Damian Hinds&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Find out what happened when <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a> visited our new Rare Diseases Centre to mark <a href="/hashtag/RareDiseaseDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RareDiseaseDay</b></a> last week. He met patients and staff to find out how the Centre is improving care for people living with rare conditions <a href="/DHSCgovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="37963496"><s>@</s><b>DHSCgovuk</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/mSIt44ubeI" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2FWNLPa" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2FWNLPa"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2FWNLPa</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/9N7kbvDMPs" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/9N7kbvDMPs</a></p>

Thanks to <a href="/JBrokenshire" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="92498317"><s>@</s><b>JBrokenshire</b></a> for attending and speaking, as well as the Minister <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a> for responding<a href="https://t.co/k8qlLQKjmw" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/k8qlLQKjmw</a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">17</span>

  </button>

We agree with <a href="/StudentMindsOrg" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="376123838"><s>@</s><b>StudentMindsOrg</b></a> &amp; <a href="/UMHANUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1074431437"><s>@</s><b>UMHANUK</b></a> that communities have health assets that can contribute to positive health and wellbeing.           <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/NHSEngland" data-user-id="551426814">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">NHS England</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>NHSEngland</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today is <a href="/hashtag/RareDiseaseDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RareDiseaseDay</b></a>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We were delighted to welcome <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a> to our Rare Diseases Centre at St Thomas this morning to mark <a href="/hashtag/RareDiseaseDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RareDiseaseDay</b></a>. He met patients, patient reps &amp; staff to find out more about living with a rare condition &amp; how our new centre is improving care &amp; experience <a href="/DHSCgovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="37963496"><s>@</s><b>DHSCgovuk</b></a><a href="https://t.co/lELckTlEL2" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/lELckTlEL2</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On national <a href="/hashtag/RareDiseaseDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RareDiseaseDay</b></a>, its great to see how hard <a href="/GSTTnhs" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="561014615"><s>@</s><b>GSTTnhs</b></a> staff are working to support patients and their families. We are committed to exploring new ways to improve the lives of those with very rare conditions.<a href="https://t.co/velBRUqlY6" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/velBRUqlY6</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great cross-party debate on importance of delivering the cancer strategy in Parliament yday. Thanks to <a href="/ThangamMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="262163061"><s>@</s><b>ThangamMP</b></a> <a href="/DrLisaCameronMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2801867041"><s>@</s><b>DrLisaCameronMP</b></a> and <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a> for all work for young people with cancer. We need your support! <a href="/hashtag/YoungCancerVoices?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>YoungCancerVoices</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/TalkTeenageCancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TalkTeenageCancer</b></a><a href="https://t.co/cAZlEvWuxD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ThangamMP/status/966704677319528449" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ThangamMP/status/966704677319528449"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ThangamMP/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/966704677319528449</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Some very well informed and moving speeches in the debate on <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Cancerstrategy</b></span> from across the house.     <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The PM today met Baroness Jowell and her family with the Health and Social Care Secretary to discuss proposals to improve brain cancer care, as <a href="/DHSCgovuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="37963496"><s>@</s><b>DHSCgovuk</b></a> and <a href="/CR_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20693661"><s>@</s><b>CR_UK</b></a> announce a 45 million boost to brain tumour research to tackle a disease where survival rates remain far too low<a href="https://t.co/SOqhFBGg55" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/SOqhFBGg55</a></p>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/882519991777722368/JyoDCGDY_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The NHS turns 70 this year and is a source of great national pride for us all. Pleasure to meet Ethel, who worked as a nurse in the NHS on its first day in 1948, at the launch of the <a href="/hashtag/NHS70?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS70</b></a> Awards this lunchtime. More <a href="https://t.co/OEUKNPMGbf" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.nhs70awards.co.uk" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.nhs70awards.co.uk"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">nhs70awards.co.uk</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/qHtfcs3Lrj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/qHtfcs3Lrj</a></p>
</div>

Here are 10 ways we can all reduce our risk and prevent cancer - lets <a href="/hashtag/BeatNCDs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BeatNCDs</b></a>.<a href="https://t.co/ihlMXoUxco" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ihlMXoUxco</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Day 3 of February <a href="/hashtag/oesophagealcancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>oesophagealcancer</b></a> Awareness Month.   Persistent heartburn can lead to <a href="/hashtag/Barrett?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Barrett</b></a>'s Oesophagus for 10% of sufferers.   Probably half a million in UK have Barrett's.   If we diagnosed them we could monitor the precursor condition for adenocarcinoma</p>
</div>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">And while were on the subject, I am delighted <a href="/hashtag/Perjeta?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Perjeta</b></a> is now available on the <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a> for people like Sarah in the linked film - <a href="/hashtag/breastcancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>breastcancer</b></a> robs thousands of lives each yearso it is absolutely critical we are at the cutting edge of treatment.<a href="https://t.co/5PEd2l4L2J" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2nwHRLT" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2nwHRLT"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2nwHRLT</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">There are almost 100,000 <a href="/hashtag/strokes?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>strokes</b></a> every year in UK - why we all need to know how to <a href="/hashtag/ActFAST?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ActFAST</b></a>- spotting signs - Face, Arms, Speech- and getting there in Time. Make sure youre prepared - watch <a href="/TheStrokeAssoc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="21200255"><s>@</s><b>TheStrokeAssoc</b></a> video<a href="https://t.co/raumtPGGdm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tGHcDuXY6kk" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tGHcDuXY6kk"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">youtube.com/watch?v=tGHcDu</span><span class="invisible">XY6kk</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


      

      
        


      
          <div class="card2 js-media-container&#10;    " data-card2-name="player">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tonight Parliament made the wrong decision and I fear its one we will live to regret. Urgent work that is so urgent .... it wont start until 2025! And whats worse, we just handed control of the whole process to a mystery unaccountable Board.<a href="https://t.co/E1gd5pWhBR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-42891608" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-42891608"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politi</span><span class="invisible">cs-42891608</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Jeremy Hunt Retweeted The Telegraph</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Important review announced today by <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>brineminister</b></a>  addiction to prescription drugs rarely gets attention it deserves, but can be every bit as devastating as hard drug addiction if unchecked. Experts will help us understand how to avoid devastating impact seen elsewhere.<a href="https://t.co/m2fsCZNjFE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/telegraph/status/956066098037903360" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/telegraph/status/956066098037903360"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/telegraph/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/956066098037903360</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Jeremy Hunt added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Telegraph/status/956066098037903360" data-conversation-id="956066098037903360" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="956066098037903360" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Telegraph" data-user-id="16343974" href="/Telegraph/status/956066098037903360" data-conversation-id="956066098037903360" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">The Telegraph</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Telegraph</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Middle-aged women fuelling rise in addictions to painkillers, anti-anxiety drugs and antidepressants <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/01/24/ministers-demand-action-rising-numbers-hooked-painkillers-anti/?utm_campaign=Echobox&amp;utm_medium=Social&amp;utm_source=Twitter" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/01/24/ministers-demand-action-rising-numbers-hooked-painkillers-anti/?utm_campaign=Echobox&amp;utm_medium=Social&amp;utm_source=Twitter"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/01/2</span><span class="invisible">4/ministers-demand-action-rising-numbers-hooked-painkillers-anti/?utm_campaign=Echobox&amp;utm_medium=Social&amp;utm_source=Twitter</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Last night I responded to an Adjournment debate in the <a href="/HouseofCommons" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="950249762"><s>@</s><b>HouseofCommons</b></a> from <a href="/KwasiKwarteng" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="707967655031005186"><s>@</s><b>KwasiKwarteng</b></a> on Neuroblastoma. You can review it here; <a href="https://t.co/VtHZsO0vBL" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2018-01-23/debates/8D011A32-312E-429A-ABA5-F669AC0041E7/Neuroblastoma" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2018-01-23/debates/8D011A32-312E-429A-ABA5-F669AC0041E7/Neuroblastoma"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2018-0</span><span class="invisible">1-23/debates/8D011A32-312E-429A-ABA5-F669AC0041E7/Neuroblastoma</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to hear <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a> comments last night. He said The Government are fully supportive of The Less Survivable Cancers Taskforce, which I launchedspecifically to address the survivability gap between the least and the most survivable cancers. <a href="https://t.co/wJl1gYSyDW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2DztYUd" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2DztYUd"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2DztYUd</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Excellent discussion b/w <a href="/ProfBrianCox" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="17939037"><s>@</s><b>ProfBrianCox</b></a> &amp; <a href="/CMO_England" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4524846597"><s>@</s><b>CMO_England</b></a> on <a href="/hashtag/Antibiotics?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Antibiotics</b></a>.             <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On Friday I visited Hobbs Rehabilitation in my own Winchester constituency to meet staff and patients as part of the critical <a href="/hashtag/RehabMatters?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RehabMatters</b></a> campaign. A world class organisation literally changing lives.<a href="https://t.co/jRNLrSIcx4" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/jRNLrSIcx4</a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">10</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Anna Jewell Retweeted Pancreatic Cancer UK</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Feeling very excited about launching this survey. Should give us strong evidence on the support services needed to help people with pancreatic cancer manage symptoms. Please help us promote this survey to anyone diagnosed with <a href="/hashtag/pancreaticcancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>pancreaticcancer</b></a> in the UK<a href="https://t.co/O5PHHh8xjy" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pancreaticcanuk/status/951399292828348417" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pancreaticcanuk/status/951399292828348417"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pancreaticcanu</span><span class="invisible">k/status/951399292828348417</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Anna Jewell added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/PancreaticCanUK/status/951399292828348417" data-conversation-id="951399292828348417" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="951399292828348417" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="PancreaticCanUK" data-user-id="139992243" href="/PancreaticCanUK/status/951399292828348417" data-conversation-id="951399292828348417" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Pancreatic Cancer UK</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>PancreaticCanUK</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Today we are launching our brand new Patient Experience Survey. If you have been diagnosed with pancreatic cancer, help us identity ways in which support services could be improved for future <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>pancreaticcancer</b></span></div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Via <a href="/thetimes" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="6107422"><s>@</s><b>thetimes</b></a> Tameside Hospital has banned all sugar from its restaurant<a href="https://t.co/9LrXhWO4Jn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/thetimes/status/950642049606438912" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/thetimes/status/950642049606438912"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/thetimes/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/950642049606438912</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">NHS England Media added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Yesterday we announced that we are merging with <a href="/Bowel_Cancer_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="107024149"><s>@</s><b>Bowel_Cancer_UK</b></a> to create the UKs leading bowel cancer charity. Were thrilled by the positive messages weve received. Thank you for all your support. You can read all about the merger here: <a href="https://t.co/6osNH6p8CX" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2BFDKqf" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2BFDKqf"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2BFDKqf</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/Lpvwtautd3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Lpvwtautd3</a></p>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Good luck to <a href="/Bowel_Cancer_UK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="107024149"><s>@</s><b>Bowel_Cancer_UK</b></a> and <a href="/bowelcancer" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="79151420"><s>@</s><b>bowelcancer</b></a> who are joining together to become the UKs leading bowel cancer charity. <a href="/hashtag/StrongerTogether?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StrongerTogether</b></a><a href="https://t.co/hYlAW0tml9" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.bowelcanceruk.org.uk/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.bowelcanceruk.org.uk/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bowelcanceruk.org.uk</span><span class="invisible">/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Prof Ian Cumming HEE chief exec launches the <a href="/hashtag/DraftWorkforceStrategy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>DraftWorkforceStrategy</b></a> which  describes the current state of <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a> &amp; <a href="/hashtag/socialcare?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>socialcare</b></a> workforce &amp; key decisions that could impact on the shape of future workforce. Now have your say <a href="https://t.co/0wqBvwvxIt" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://consultation.hee.nhs.uk/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://consultation.hee.nhs.uk/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">consultation.hee.nhs.uk</span><span class="invisible">/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/Uol2u4n8o7" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Uol2u4n8o7</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This morning I met the <a href="/LessSurvivable" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="843746185340997632"><s>@</s><b>LessSurvivable</b></a> Cancer Taskforce. Thank you for all you do.<a href="https://t.co/y15JLTNL9p" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/y15JLTNL9p</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Thread  <a href="/hashtag/12DaysofHIV?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>12DaysofHIV</b></a>!

2017 has been a big year for <a href="/hashtag/HIV?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HIV</b></a> and sexual health in the UK. Over the next 12 days, were going to be marking, celebrating and remembering all thats been achieved with our very own festive countdown. Lets go<a href="https://t.co/Y8RmhXebUb" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Y8RmhXebUb</a></p>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/mattwarman" data-user-id="17685009">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Matt Warman MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>mattwarman</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Nobody with the best interests of the NHS at heart plays politics with a health trust.       <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today, at the <a href="/hashtag/BritainAgainstCancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BritainAgainstCancer</b></a> conference, we launch our Cancer Workforce Plan - as promised when I gave evidence to the <a href="/APPGC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="217442176"><s>@</s><b>APPGC</b></a> inquiry last month. <a href="https://t.co/uSmOO9pMJa" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/more-cancer-specialists-to-be-employed-by-the-nhs" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.gov.uk/government/news/more-cancer-specialists-to-be-employed-by-the-nhs"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">gov.uk/government/new</span><span class="invisible">s/more-cancer-specialists-to-be-employed-by-the-nhs</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Anyone who knows me will know this was my favourite stand at the <a href="/hashtag/BritainAgainstCancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BritainAgainstCancer</b></a> exhibition this morning.       <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Wearing my red ribbon todayfor <a href="/hashtag/WorldAIDsDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WorldAIDsDay</b></a> as a symbol of unity and the fantastic progress were making towards halting HIV and AIDS <a href="/hashtag/SeeRed?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SeeRed</b></a> <a href="/THTorguk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="78621972"><s>@</s><b>THTorguk</b></a><a href="https://t.co/l7F9jSpFqa" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/l7F9jSpFqa</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">APPG for Diabetes Retweeted DHSC Media Centre</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Excellent to see <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a> supporting this sugar reduction from <a href="/KelloggsUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19400602"><s>@</s><b>KelloggsUK</b></a> and agree that this is only the start and more needs to be done by companies and organisations to ensure the health of the nation.<a href="https://t.co/HD9ib5R5dQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/DeptHealthPress/status/936246070748831744" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/DeptHealthPress/status/936246070748831744"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/DeptHealthPres</span><span class="invisible">s/status/936246070748831744</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">APPG for Diabetes added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Fungai from <a href="/SophiaForum" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="373459152"><s>@</s><b>SophiaForum</b></a> told her story of living with <a href="/hashtag/HIV?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HIV</b></a> to MPs this week. 

If you're a woman living with HIV in the UK, please take this short survey and help ensure women are represented when it comes to HIV: <a href="https://t.co/WPMgOPyTAu" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/thtsfexperience" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/thtsfexperience"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">surveymonkey.co.uk/r/thtsfexperie</span><span class="invisible">nce</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/gRcKL29ziS" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/gRcKL29ziS</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/882519991777722368/JyoDCGDY_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Steve Brine MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>BrineMinister</b></span></a>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Steve Brine MP Retweeted ONS</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Cancer survival rates are at a record high and Im delighted that this weeks ONS figures show they are continuing to improve and closing the inequalities gap. <a href="/hashtag/followtheevidence?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>followtheevidence</b></a><a href="https://t.co/C7JSiDV7K7" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ONS/status/935822464541773824" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ONS/status/935822464541773824"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ONS/status/935</span><span class="invisible">822464541773824</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Steve Brine MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ONS/status/935822464541773824" data-conversation-id="935822464541773824" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="935822464541773824" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ONS" data-user-id="219275799" href="/ONS/status/935822464541773824" data-conversation-id="935822464541773824" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">ONS</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ONS</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Correction: The one-year all-cancer survival index for England has increased by 11.1 percentage points from 61.2% in 2000 to 72.3% in 2015 <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/CYzx30gT1vm" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/CYzx30gT1vm"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/CYzx30gT1vm</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Leading by example  thank you public health minister <a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>brineminister</b></a> for coming in to talk to people living with HIV and get tested for <a href="/hashtag/HIVTestWeek?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HIVTestWeek</b></a>. 

People living with <a href="/hashtag/HIV?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HIV</b></a> in the UK live as long as anyone else thanks to effective treatment  but early diagnosis is key.<a href="https://t.co/Z12L4Bzn9o" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Z12L4Bzn9o</a></p>
</div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus Retweeted WHO</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Its World Antibiotic Awareness Week. <a href="/hashtag/AntibioticResistance?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AntibioticResistance</b></a> is a global health crisis that must be addressed with the utmost urgency.<a href="https://t.co/mgtaKPsytA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/WHO/status/929849231808061440" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/WHO/status/929849231808061440"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/WHO/status/929</span><span class="invisible">849231808061440</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/WHO/status/929849231808061440" data-conversation-id="929849231808061440" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="929849231808061440" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="WHO" data-user-id="14499829" href="/WHO/status/929849231808061440" data-conversation-id="929849231808061440" tabindex="0">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">It's World Antibiotic Awareness Week!
ALWAYS seek the advice of a qualified healthcare professional before taking antibiotics. <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f48a.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Pill" aria-label="Emoji: Pill" /> Help us stop the spread of <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AntibioticResistance</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/OgE079jHRQ</span></div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">When I was diagnosed with <a href="/hashtag/T1D?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>T1D</b></a>, it came as a shock. But to all of you with diabetes, on World <a href="/hashtag/Diabetes?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Diabetes</b></a> Day, I want to say this: <a href="/hashtag/T1D?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>T1D</b></a> should not stop you from fulfilling your ambitions. <a href="/hashtag/WDD?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WDD</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/WDD2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WDD2017</b></a><a href="https://t.co/yEq0EkCzh3" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jdrfuk/status/930326784108908545" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jdrfuk/status/930326784108908545"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jdrfuk/status/</span><span class="invisible">930326784108908545</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/BrineMinister" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="881460664270761984"><s>@</s><b>BrineMinister</b></a>: Nationally dental access continues to grow, and 1.9m more patients were seen between 2010 and 2016. The Starting Well programme will improve oral health in children under five, in 13 high priority areas. <a href="/hashtag/HealthOrals?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HealthOrals</b></a></p>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/WHO" data-user-id="14499829">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/875476478988886016/_l61qZdR_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">WHO</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>WHO</b></span></a>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Keith Ridge Retweeted The Pharmaceutical Journal</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks to community <a href="/hashtag/pharmacists?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>pharmacists</b></a> for a fantastic contribution - vitally important we keep the momentum going in November <a href="/hashtag/jabathon?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>jabathon</b></a><a href="https://t.co/DfvuoIgQEj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/PJOnline_News/status/926495428975255552" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/PJOnline_News/status/926495428975255552"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/PJOnline_News/</span><span class="invisible">status/926495428975255552</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

We are now on Purple Alert. Get purple &amp; save lives <a href="https://t.co/yG3b1RM6XQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2yTrpwA" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2yTrpwA"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2yTrpwA</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/NEDu7cjG2I" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/NEDu7cjG2I</a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">85</span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">

    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        is-square&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        &#10;        ">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="920607130314592256" data-item-id="920607130314592256" data-permalink-path="/BrineMinister/status/920607130314592256" data-conversation-id="920607130314592256" data-tweet-nonce="920607130314592256-ce7a8dd3-42d0-4fa9-9dd6-8c03c0879f50" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="BrineMinister" data-name="Steve Brine MP" data-user-id="881460664270761984" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;881460664270761984&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;BrineMinister&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="context">
      
      
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/882519991777722368/JyoDCGDY_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Steve Brine MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>BrineMinister</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Smoking remains biggest preventable killer, causing 79,000 deaths a year &amp; costing the NHS 2.5bn. Join <a href="/hashtag/Stoptober?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Stoptober</b></a><a href="https://t.co/AYeHEnBc1O" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/stoptober/home" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/stoptober/home"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">nhs.uk/oneyou/stoptob</span><span class="invisible">er/home</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="908291931687538688" id="stream-item-tweet-908291931687538688" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;908291931687538688&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="907568440189353985" data-item-id="907568440189353985" data-permalink-path="/BrineMinister/status/907568440189353985" data-conversation-id="907568440189353985" data-tweet-nonce="907568440189353985-5becb790-256c-4e29-9c9a-3b53aa65b56e" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="BrineMinister" data-name="Steve Brine MP" data-user-id="881460664270761984" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="PHE_uk" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;881460664270761984&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;BrineMinister&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;41822696&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PHE_uk&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;PublicHealthEngland&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;PublicHealthEngland&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;PublicHealthEngland&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jamiebrookes" data-user-id="46093953">

      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Items which should not be routinely prescribed in primary care. 
Find out about our low value medicines consultation <a href="https://t.co/7fQMhQZWq8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/sj6Q30dNLlZ" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/sj6Q30dNLlZ"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/sj6Q30dNLlZ</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/ik1tXfNtsR" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ik1tXfNtsR</a></p>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">76</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Blog from <a href="/Jeremy_Hunt" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="112398730"><s>@</s><b>Jeremy_Hunt</b></a> on ambition to halve rates of stillbirth, maternal &amp; neonatal deaths &amp; birth-related brain injuries in babies by 2030<a href="https://t.co/adgsZFAAfX" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/MidwivesRCM/status/885142835099561984" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/MidwivesRCM/status/885142835099561984"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/MidwivesRCM/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/885142835099561984</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">DHSC Media Centre added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">The RCM</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>MidwivesRCM</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Health Secretary <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="112398730"><s>@</s><b>Jeremy_Hunt</b></span> writes on the RCM website on safety in maternity services @DeptHealthPress see <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/2vcqORH" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/2vcqORH"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/2vcqORH</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="882280846203518976" data-item-id="882280846203518976" data-permalink-path="/BrineMinister/status/882280846203518976" data-conversation-id="882280846203518976" data-tweet-nonce="882280846203518976-1803622e-2c2c-40ab-9c55-516f498fa46b" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="BrineMinister" data-name="Steve Brine MP" data-user-id="881460664270761984" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;881460664270761984&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;BrineMinister&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Steve Brine MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="context">
      
      
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/BrineMinister" data-user-id="881460664270761984">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/882519991777722368/JyoDCGDY_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

        <h2 class="SignupDialog-heading">Not on Twitter? Sign up, tune into the things you care about, and get updates as they happen.</h2>
        <div class="SignupDialog-form">
<div class="signup SignupForm&#10;  ">
  <a href="https://twitter.com/signup" role="button" class="EdgeButton EdgeButton--large EdgeButton--primary SignupForm-submit u-block js-signup " data-component="dialog" data-element="signup">Sign up</a>
</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="SignupDialog-footer modal-footer u-textCenter">
        Have an account? <a class="SignupDialog-signinLink" href="/login" rel="noopener">Log in </a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
